COVER_STORY.TEXT:
Here are some monsters from the Planet Apres.
We're going to hear some stories about them.
In the stories, these monsters are going to play a game by asking questions, trying to find something out as quickly as possible.
Some questions are good and will help find out the answer quickly, and some question are bad and mean the monster might take a long time to find the answer.
You need to tell me how good their questions are, that is, how quickly they will find out the answer.
